item.title: About Me
item.description: My name is Arsh though some of you may know me as Spector. I am an Electronics Engineer but I am equally interested in programming and automation. I like to mess with computers to learn about them. I dabble in many different areas like programming, automation, information security, electronics, music, movies, books, gaming and football. Things I am good at C Shell Scripting Linux Terminal and terminal utilities like awk, sed, grep etc.

item.title: First Blog
item.description: This is my first blog on the site I don’t know exactly if I will be posting regularly on the blogs. I am sure not many people are eagerly waiting either. However since I used Hugo to create this site I though why not make a tutorial for new users who might want their own website. Installation I installed hugo on Artix Linux so it was as easy as > pacman -S hugo You can find hugo on most of the distros and their respective repos.
